message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.NE 

The paper deals with machine learning training paradigms and proposes a sample efficient reinforcement learning approach for adapting the loss dynamically during training. This suggests that the paper is likely to belong to the sub-category of Machine Learning (cs.LG). Additionally, the paper deals with optimization of evaluation metrics, which is a common theme in Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) and Computer Vision (cs.CV) research. The paper also mentions classification scenarios, which is a common theme in Natural Language Processing (cs.CL) research. Finally, the use of reinforcement learning suggests that the paper may also belong to the sub-category of Neural and Evolutionary Computing (cs.NE).
